ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:name: sgdma_mem_map
ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:description: Scatter Gather Direct Memory Access Controller Memory Map

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: MM2S_CTRL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Memory Map to Streaming Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERR_IRQ_MASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: To mask out Interrupt event when Error detected.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CMPL_IRQ_MASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: To mask out Interrupt event upon transfer completion.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RESET
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Soft reset to reset MM2S DMA core.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: MM2S_STS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Memory Map to Streaming Status Register

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: MM2S_CURDESC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Memory Map to Streaming Current Descriptor Pointer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MM2S_CURDESC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address pointer to Current MM2S Descriptor.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: S2MM_CTRL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Memory Map to Streaming Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERR_IRQ_MASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: To mask out Interrupt event when Error detected.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CMPL_IRQ_MASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: To mask out Interrupt event upon transfer completion.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RESET
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Soft reset to reset S2MM DMA core.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: S2MM_STS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Memory Map to Streaming Status Register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: S2MM_CURDESC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Memory Map to Streaming Current Descriptor Pointer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: S2MM_CURDESC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address pointer to Current S2MM Descriptor.
